title: Evenepoel, Vingegaard, Vine, Kras, Quinn Sustain Fractures, Roglič Escapes With No Broken Bones
content:
UPDATED: Spill on rough roads at Itzulia Basque Country leaves toll of fractured bones, concussions, cuts, scrapes, and a punctured lung across several teams, but no life-threatening injuries.

Read the full article at Evenepoel, Vingegaard, Vine, Kras, Quinn Sustain Fractures, Roglič Escapes With No Broken Bones on Velo.
author: ahood
